column4: How can I recover the root password ? I tried different options on the web but none of them seems to be working and I don't have livecd
and for some reason my sudo user has been deleted from the sudoers
just select last one , switch to recovery mode
when I select that It asks me a maintenance password
when I press that it just exits to that menu
when I chose that it asked me for password which I don't know :(
takes me back to the options menu
